title: SIGSEGV on execution stage while using Erigon3
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: 2.40.1-stable-94b4cee5

OS & Version: Linux 6.1.14

Erigon Command (with flags/config): 
```erigon --private.api.addr=localhost:9090 --torrent.download.rate=100mb --http=false --batchSize 16384M --etl.bufferSize 16384M --bodies.cache 2147483648 --rpc.batch.concurrency 100000 --maxpeers 150 --experimental.history.v3 --experimental.transactions.v3 --v5disc```

Concensus Layer: internal

Chain/Network: mainnet

#### Expected behaviour
Execution proceeds without problems.

#### Actual behaviour
At the execution stage, SEGFAULT occurs, in approximately the same place.

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour
I can't say for sure.
